src:
Kabar Terkini 6 Pemain Naturalisasi yang Gagal Berkibar di Timnas Indonesia
04 Nov 2019, 10:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Setiap pemain Indonesia pasti punya impian memperkuat tim nasional. Memakai jersey dengan lambang Garuda di dada dan menyanyikan lagu Indonesia Raya dengan disaksikan seluruh rakyat Indonesia tentu menjadi sebuah kebanggaan bagi sang pemain.
Banyak pemain di Indonesia seolah berlomba-lomba menjadi bagian dari timnas, baik itu kelompok umur ataupun senior. Tak hanya pemain asli Indonesia, bahkan pemain asing juga kepincut masuk timnas.
Sejauh ini kurang lebih sudah ada sekitar 25 pemain asing yang berstatus WNI. Angka tersebut tentunya masih berpotensi bertambah lagi selama jalur naturalisasi pemain masih dibuka.
Dari 25 pemain, tak semuanya berhasil masuk Timnas Indonesia. Apalagi ada fakta, naturalisasi di Indonesia tak sepenuhnya untuk kepentingan memperkuat timnas, melainkan menjadi strategi klub memperoleh prestasi secara instan.
Beberapa pemain naturalisasi yang berhasil berkostum Timnas Indonesia antara lain Cristian Gonzales, Victor Igbonefo hingga Stefano Lilipaly. Bahkan, dua nama terakhir masih kerap dipanggil memperkuat Timnas Indonesia.
Cristian Gonzales menjadi satu di antara pemain penting Timnas Indonesia di ajang Piala AFF 2010. Selama berkarier di Timnas Indonesia, Gonzales mampu mencatatkan 31 penampilan dengan menyumbang 13 gol di semua ajang.
Namun, tak semua pemain naturalisasi bisa mengilap seperti Cristian Gonzales yang bisa mencetak banyak gol bersama Timnas Indonesia. Bahkan ada pemain naturalisasi yang hanya dipanggil memperkuat timnas beberapa sekali saja, atau bahkan sama sekali tak mendapat panggilan ke timnas.
Kini, beberapa pemain tersebut ada yang memilih kembali ke negaranya, ada juga yang meniti karier sebagai pelatih. Berikut iniabar terbaru pemain naturalisasi gagal bersinar di Timnas Indonesia seperti dilansir Bola.com.
text:
Latest News 6 Naturalization Players Who Failed to Fly in the Indonesian National Team
Nov 04 2019, 10:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Every Indonesian player must have a dream to strengthen the national team. Wearing a jersey with the Garuda symbol on the chest and singing the song Indonesia Raya witnessed by all the people of Indonesia would be a pride for the player.
Many players in Indonesia seemed to be competing to be part of the national team, both age groups and seniors. Not only Indonesian native players, even foreign players are also attracted to the national team.
So far there have been approximately 25 foreign players with Indonesian citizenship status. This figure is certainly still potentially increasing again as long as the player's naturalization path is still open.
Of the 25 players, not all of them made it into the Indonesian national team. Moreover, there are facts, naturalization in Indonesia is not entirely in the interests of strengthening the national team, but rather becomes a strategy for the club to get instant achievements.
Some naturalized players who succeeded in costuming the Indonesian national team include Cristian Gonzales, Victor Igbonefo to Stefano Lilipaly. In fact, the last two names are still often called to strengthen the Indonesian National Team.
Cristian Gonzales became one of the important Indonesian national team players in the 2010 AFF Cup. During his career at the Indonesian national team, Gonzales was able to record 31 appearances by contributing 13 goals in all competitions.
However, not all naturalized players can shine like Cristian Gonzales who can score a lot of goals with the Indonesian national team. There are even naturalized players who have only been called to strengthen the national team a few times, or even did not get a call to the national team.
Now, there are some of these players who choose to return to their country, some are pursuing careers as coaches. Here is the latest news on the naturalized player who failed to shine in the Indonesian national team as reported by Bola.com.
